thoughts.subject: Reviewing the Infrastructure
thoughts.description: I'm now diving into the infrastructure directory. I've spotted `docker-compose.yml`, `build-backend.ps1`, and `start-backend.ps1`. Looks like the backend will be containerized. It's time to examine those files.

thoughts.subject: Examining Build Process
thoughts.description: Okay, I've confirmed the existence of the expected files in the infrastructure directory. Now, I'm focusing on `build-backend.ps1`. The next step involves reading and understanding the commands within the script. I'm aiming to figure out how the backend is constructed.

messages.content: Ok, o script para construir a imagem do backend falhou. Para contornar isso, vou ler o conteúdo do script `build-backend.ps1` para entender os passos e executá-los diretamente.

thoughts.subject: Examining the Script's Logic
thoughts.description: I'm currently focused on the `build-backend.ps1` script. My goal is to understand its operations, since I can't use the original way to create the image. I'll analyze the code to determine a suitable alternative approach.

thoughts.subject: Understanding the Build Process
thoughts.description: I've started analyzing the `build-backend.ps1` script, focusing on its core functions. It seems I will have to dissect the script to identify the essential build steps. My initial idea is to try to execute the commands it contains directly, adapting them to the allowed tools.
